ProductInfo.Features:
4 channel H.264 compression triplex real time industrial DVR with 2TB hard drive
Support iPhone and Google phone surveillance. Support the live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network
Support EZOOM, daylight saving time and PIP function. Recording mode: continuous / time schedule / motion detection
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
Camera Feature: color CCD sensor, 420TVL, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, power requirement: 12V DC 500mA (included)
ProductInfo.Name: Videosecu 4 Channel Security DVR Cctv H.264 Real-time Remote Network Digital Video Recorder System with 2000GB Hard Drive, 4 Outdoor Day Night Infrared Bullet Surveillance Cameras, Extension Cables and Power Supplies WP2
